actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that housing, housing assistance, and community development programs authorized by Congress should be carried out at levels at least equal to the levels prevailing in calendar year 1972, until such time as funds appropriated for such programs are exhausted or the Congress enacts legislation terminating or replacing such programs.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that housing, housing assistance, and community development programs authorized by Congress should be carried out at levels at least equal to the levels prevailing in calendar year 1972, until such time as funds appropriated for such programs are exhausted or the Congress enacts legislation terminating or replacing such programs.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that housing, housing assistance, and community development programs authorized by Congress should be carried out at levels at least equal to the levels prevailing in calendar year 1972, until such time as funds appropriated for such programs are exhausted or the Congress enacts legislation terminating or replacing such programs.
